headers.value: default-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data: https:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src 'self' https://*.base.org https://sepolia.base.org https://rpc.sepolia.base.org https://api.dexscreener.com https://sepolia.basescan.org https://*.walletconnect.com wss://*.walletconnect.com; frame-src https://dexscreener.com https://www.dexscreener.com; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'; upgrade-insecure-requests
